local_intent: verify approach and alignment to the white_plate by detecting it, executing ApproachAndAlign, and confirming visibility
assumptions: white_plate is present and detectable in the camera view
robot can execute ApproachAndAlign within specified timeout
no intervening obstacles block the approach path
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT intent for the 'verify' phase: detection -> approach/align -> verification before grasp, matching the global sequence and stepwise plan.
